attributes.action: Stop employers paying for people that have been told to isolate
attributes.additional_details:
There has to be some order now. People are going home from work because of the NHS track and trace app or getting tested when there is nothing wrong with them and capable of working.
This is a vicious circus that needs to stop.
95% of the population are perfectly fit for work.
Workers are going home from work just to have time off work and still get paid by going for test or getting pinged by the app they are shouting it from the roof tops all over social media , when they are perfectly well.
attributes.background:
To make employers to stop pay to employees who go home due to being pinged by the app or testing because they want some time off work and there is nothing wrong with them! 
This is a constant work disruption and companies need all their work force in work due to last year and half of suffering
